cyclone.name: HANNA
cyclone.current_location: about 370 miles ESE of Port O'Connor, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: continuing west-northwest across the north-western Gulf toward the central Texas coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central Texas coast near Port O'Connor/Corpus Christi

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch from San Luis Pass to High Island, Texas
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Port Mansfield to San Luis Pass, Texas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Gulf Coast from Louisiana westward to south-central Texas
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (≤5%) of brief tropical-storm-force gusts; prevailing winds expected below gale force.
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor tidal rise and dangerous rip currents possible but surge >3 ft not expected for New Orleans area.
weather_observation.rainfall: Periods of heavy rain, 3–5 inches possible with locally higher totals, may cause urban and small-stream flooding.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Hazardous surf and rip currents along southeast Louisiana beaches.
